addr: 131 South Saint John Avenue Pasadena, CA 91123
title: Pastor Che's 60th
desc: Join us for a night under the stars, in beautiful Pasadena,  for an evening of fine dining, dazzling entertainment and honoring Ch? Ahn. Saturday, January 16, 2016, 6-10 pm On the fountain side plaza of the Ambassador Auditorium.   Classic Hollywood Theme   Please Dress in Formal Attire     $150 per person / $1,000 per table of 8   Includes Catered Dinner and Program,   featuring Special Guests and Live Performances The ticket sales from this night will bless Ch? and the ministries he oversees: HRock Church, HIM and WLI --- If you would like to reserve a Table of 8, please contact us directly at snardi@hrockchurch.com
